cab.content:
(This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.)
G.T.5894
SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 6th OCTOBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
British Front.
We have made a slight gain of ground East Of FRESNOY (S. of LENS) and North of AUBENCHEUL. Otherwise there is no change in the general situation.
French Front.
ST.ETIENNE is now reported to be still in the hands of the enemy. Slight progress has been made North of BETHENIVILLE. Otherwise there is nothing of interest to report.
2. ITALIAN & MACEDONIAN FRONTS.
No change.
3. PALESTINE FRONT.
It is reported that SIDON has been evacuated by the Turks. Our mounted troops are advancing North-West of DAMASCUS on ZAHLE.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
6th October, 1918.
Issued at 6.10 p.m.
